product_name: Hi-Tec Altitude V Waterproof Jr Hiking Boots - Kids'
long_description: Outfit your young hiker with the leather Hi-Tec Altitude V Waterproof Jr Hiking Boots. They'll keep his or her feet dry for year-round fun on your favorite hiking trails. Waterproof full-grain leather uppers have waterproof liners built in to keep your child's feet dry. Compression-mold EVA midsoles absorb impacts. Rustproof metal hardware holds up year after year. Big-Fit dual-insole system lets you adjust the interior volume of the boots and create more space when your child's feet grow. Hi-Tec Altitude V Waterproof Jr Hiking Boots have multidirectional lugs on the rubber outsoles that provide good traction.
short_description: Outfit your young hiker with the leather Hi-Tec Altitude V Waterproof Jr Hiking Boots. They'll keep his or her feet dry for year-round fun on your favorite hiking trails.
